mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize) VALUES (reply_seq.nextval, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{photo}, #{communityno}, #{memberno}, #{photo1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize FROM REPLY ORDER BY REPLYNO
SELECT replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize FROM REPLY WHERE communityno = #{communityno} ORDER BY REPLYNO
